name: Video Speeder Initial Implementation Plan (#1)
observations: Defines steps for creating a Python CLI tool to speed up silent video sections.
Located at docs/plans/initial_implementation.md.
Relies on Python 3.x and FFmpeg.
Specifies using argparse for CLI arguments.
Details FFmpeg filtergraph construction (silencedetect, trim, setpts, atempo, drawtext, concat).
Specifies using the 'tqdm' library for progress reporting (Task 4.3).
Associated with GitHub issue jakkaj/videospeeder#1.

name: videospeeder_project/videospeeder.py
observations: Main Python script for videospeeder CLI tool.

name: videospeeder_project/requirements.txt
observations: Lists Python dependencies for videospeeder project. Includes tqdm.

name: videospeeder_project/README.md
observations: Project documentation for videospeeder.

name: Initial project structure and requirements
observations: Created videospeeder_project directory and initial files.
Added tqdm to requirements.txt.

name: Initial CLI argument parsing
observations: Implemented argparse CLI in videospeeder.py with all required arguments and defaults.

name: Implement FFmpeg silencedetect execution
observations: Added run_silencedetect() to videospeeder.py to execute FFmpeg silencedetect and capture stderr.

name: Implement silencedetect output parsing
observations: Added parse_silencedetect_output() to videospeeder.py to extract silence_start and silence_end timestamps.

name: Calculate non-silent and silent segment timestamps
observations: Added logic to videospeeder.py to compute all segments (silent and non-silent) using silence intervals and video duration.

name: Implement dynamic FFmpeg filtergraph generation
observations: Added build_filtergraph() to videospeeder.py to generate a filtergraph string for all segments, speed, and indicator.

name: Implement main FFmpeg processing execution
observations: Added run_ffmpeg_processing() to videospeeder.py to execute the main FFmpeg command with the generated filtergraph.

name: Integrate all components in videospeeder.py
observations: Orchestrated full flow in main(): parse args, detect silence, calculate segments, build filtergraph, execute processing.

name: Add basic error handling and user feedback
observations: Added checks for ffmpeg/ffprobe, input file existence, informative messages, and exception handling to videospeeder.py.

name: Implement progress reporting using tqdm
observations: Modified run_ffmpeg_processing in videospeeder.py to show a tqdm progress bar during FFmpeg processing.

name: Create initial README.md
observations: Created README.md in videospeeder_project with tool purpose, prerequisites, installation, usage, and example instructions.

name: videospeeder_project/Makefile
observations: Makefile for running, installing, and cleaning the videospeeder CLI tool.

name: Add Makefile for easy running
observations: Added Makefile to videospeeder_project with targets: install, run, clean, help.

name: Add Makefile test target for provided file
observations: Added test target to Makefile to run videospeeder.py on /mnt/c/Users/jorkni/Downloads/test speed upper.mp4 with --indicator.

name: Add GPU acceleration option
observations: Added --gpu flag to videospeeder.py to enable NVIDIA NVENC (h264_nvenc) video encoding.

name: Add GPU-accelerated decoding option
observations: Added --gpu-decode flag to videospeeder.py for NVIDIA CUVID/NVDEC hardware-accelerated decoding (experimental).

name: Add dynamic codec detection and hardware/software decoder/encoder selection
observations: Added get_video_codec() to detect input codec using ffprobe.
Updated run_ffmpeg_processing() to select decoder/encoder for h264, h265/hevc, av1 based on input codec and GPU/CPU.
Now supports dynamic selection of hardware/software decode/encode for x264, x265, av1.

name: Add rich-based colored and icon-enhanced video stats output before processing
observations: Added probe_and_print_video_stats() using rich to print colored, icon-enhanced input video stats before silence detection.
Now prints codec, resolution, fps, duration, audio info with icons and colors at program start.

name: Fix hardware decode and filtergraph compatibility with hwdownload/format
observations: Updated build_filtergraph to insert hwdownload,format=yuv420p when GPU decode is enabled.
Resolves FFmpeg filtergraph errors when using hardware decoding with software filters like setpts and drawtext.

name: Add offset and process-duration CLI options for segment processing
observations: Added --offset and --process-duration CLI arguments to process only a segment of the input video.
All processing steps (silencedetect, segment calculation, ffmpeg) now respect these options.

name: Add test-segment Makefile target for segment processing example
observations: Added test-segment target to Makefile to demonstrate --offset and --process-duration usage with videospeeder.py.
Updated help output to include test-segment example.

name: Add 2-second normal-speed buffer before non-silent segments
observations: calculate_segments now inserts a 2s non-silent buffer before each non-silent segment after a silent segment.

name: .gitignore
observations: Contains patterns for files to be ignored by git.
Now ignores videospeeder_project/output_test.mp4 and videospeeder_project/output_test_segment.mp4.

name: videospeeder_project/output_test.mp4
observations: Test output video file, should not be tracked by git.

name: videospeeder_project/output_test_segment.mp4
observations: Test output video file, should not be tracked by git.

name: Remove test output videos from git tracking and update .gitignore
observations: Removed videospeeder_project/output_test.mp4 and videospeeder_project/output_test_segment.mp4 from git tracking.
Updated .gitignore to ignore these files.

name: Implement dynamic speedup based on segment duration
observations: Modified build_filtergraph in videospeeder.py.
Silent segments 3-10s use fixed 4x speed.
Silent segments > 10s use variable speed calculated to make output ~4s long, capped at 100x.
Removed previous hardcoded 4x speed debug code.

name: Update README with dynamic speedup explanation
observations: Modified videospeeder_project/README.md.
Added details to 'How it Works' section explaining the 4x speed for 3-10s silence and variable speed for >10s silence aiming for ~4s output.

name: Increase max video speed cap to 1000x
observations: Modified videospeeder.py.
Changed MAX_VIDEO_SPEED constant from 100.0 to 1000.0.

name: Update README for 1000x max speed cap
observations: Modified videospeeder_project/README.md.
Updated 'How it Works' section to state the maximum video speed cap is now 1000x (was 100x).

name: Remove obsolete --speed argument
observations: Modified videospeeder.py.
Removed --speed CLI argument from parse_args.
Removed speed parameter from build_filtergraph function definition.
Updated build_filtergraph call in main to remove speed argument.

name: Update README to remove --speed option
observations: Modified videospeeder_project/README.md.
Removed description of --speed option.
Removed usage of -s option from example command.

name: Add Whisper Transcription Capability Plan (#2)
observations: Plan to add video transcription using OpenAI Whisper.
Located at docs/plans/2/transcription.md.
Includes adding dependencies, creating a transcription script, and Makefile integration.
Associated with GitHub issue #2.

name: Add openai-whisper to requirements.txt
observations: Added openai-whisper to videospeeder_project/requirements.txt for Whisper transcription support.

name: videospeeder_project/transcribe.py
observations: Python script for transcribing audio/video using OpenAI Whisper.
Implements CLI for input, output, and model selection.

name: Add transcribe.py Whisper script
observations: Created videospeeder_project/transcribe.py for Whisper-based transcription with CLI argument parsing.

name: Add transcribe target to Makefile
observations: Added transcribe target to Makefile to run transcribe.py with INPUT, OUTPUT, and MODEL.
Updated help output to document transcribe usage.

name: Add transcript-segment example to Makefile
observations: Added transcript-segment target to Makefile to transcribe output_test_segment.mp4 to output_test_segment.vtt using Whisper.
Updated help output to document the example.

name: Fix WriteVTT usage in transcribe.py
observations: Updated transcribe.py to correctly instantiate whisper.utils.WriteVTT with output_dir.
Changed call to use write_result(result, file=f) method.
Resolves TypeError during VTT file writing.

name: Ignore VTT files in .gitignore
observations: Added 'videospeeder_project/*.vtt' to .gitignore to prevent generated subtitle files from being committed.

name: Enhance Fast-Forward Indicator Plan (#3)
observations: Plan to replace '>>' indicator with SVG icon and speed text overlay.
Located at docs/plans/3/fast_forward_overlay.md
Involves SVG to PNG conversion, filtergraph modification (overlay, drawtext), testing, and documentation.
